column5: is their many channel cats in lake ontario? thats like one of the only fish i havent caught in ontario and i wanna catch some they look fun. im located east of the GTA and was just wondering if their is any channel cat action to get into. also do they fight good?
Yes thier are channels in Lake O but if you really wana catch some big ones head to Dunnville. Pm Fimastr is you best bet.

Good channel cat fishing in Hamilton Harbour when I was a kid. Put on something big and stinky. Rotten meat works well, chicken livers get picked apart by gobies these days, so do worms. If you use chicken livers, leave them in the sun for a couple days then tie them in roe netting or pantyhose to keep the gobies from picking them apart.  Lasalle and Pier 4 park are good starting points.  But Xrap is right, Dunnville is a great place to get into a lot of bigger fish.
